title: No train service between Boon Lay & Joo Koon due to signalling fault

updates.text: [EWL]UPDATE:Fault cleared, trains are progressively returning to normal speed.
[EWL]: Due to a track fault near JurongEast, pls add 10 mins travel time from #CityHall to #JurongEast. Train service is still available.
[EWL] CLEARED: Train services between #BoonLay & #JooKoon have resumed. Free regular bus services have ceased.
[EWL] CLEARED: Train services between #BoonLay & #JooKoon have resumed. Pls add 10mins travel time btwn #JurongEast & #JooKoon.
[EWL] UPDATE: No train service between #BoonLay & #JooKoon due to a signalling fault at #JooKoon.
